name: Brick Breaker (itch)
description:
Third game created for Complete C# Unity Developer 2D - Learn to Code Making Games

A Breakout clone made to learn about several Unity/C# basic concepts, like colliders, singletons, particle systems, etc. There is a simple and nonsense backstory to contextualize the player's actions a little bit. It may lag at the beginning (first hits), but it improves.

English is not my main language so there can be some typos.

Music: The Process by LAKEY INSPIRED
